battleships.logic

Class Battleships

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleships.logic.Battleships

  • public class Battleships
extends Object
    Class contains the main functionality of the Battleships game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Battleships(int mode, int fleetSize)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Method checks if the opponent lost.

      Method returns player1.
      Player getPlayer2()
      Method returns player2.
      Boolean newShip(Ship ship)
      Method delivers a new Ship to player1 until player1's fleet is full, then continues to deliver new Ships to player2 until their fleet is full.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayer1

        public Player getPlayer1()
        Method returns player1.
        Returns:
        player1

      • getPlayer2

        public Player getPlayer2()
        Method returns player2.
        Returns:
        player2

      • didCurrentPlayerWin

        public Boolean didCurrentPlayerWin()
        Method checks if the opponent lost.
        Returns:
        True if the opponent lost, otherwise false

      • play

        public Ship play(int x,
                 int y)
        Method calls the shoot() method of the opponent to shoot at the opponent's fleet. If the player in turn is AI the method will replace the parameter values with coordinates returned by the AI class.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the square the player wants to shoot
        y - The y coordinate of the square the player wants to shoot
        Returns:
        The Ship that was hit or null if no Ship was hit

      • newShip

        public Boolean newShip(Ship ship)
        Method delivers a new Ship to player1 until player1's fleet is full, then continues to deliver new Ships to player2 until their fleet is full. Method will not add new ships to an AI player.
        Parameters:
        ship - The ship in process of being delivered
        Returns:
        True if the Ship was successfully added to the fleet of a player, otherwise false
